## Shape.IsLocked property

True if the object is locked, False if the object can be modified when the sheet is protected.

```csharp
public bool IsLocked { get; set; }
```

### Examples

```csharp

[C#]
if(shape.IsLocked)
    shape.IsLocked = false;
```
